event.title: OpenTuesday at Digicomp, Zurich, Switzerland
event.body:
The president of FSFE, Georg Greve, will give a lecture titled "Kommerzielle, praktische und gesellschaftliche Aspekte Freier Software" during the forthcoming OpenTuesday meeting, in Zurich. The lecture is starting at 18:00, 4th of July.
OpenTuesday meetings are monthly meetings held at Digicomp, to talk and spread awareness about Free Software issues.
